short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear OPFS and the browser cache of the active tab with the click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clear OPFS and the browser cache of the active tab with the click of a button.

Version .6 (October 11th 2024)
* Added OPFS support.

Version .4 (September 15th 2021)
* Upgraded manifest from V2 to V3, chrome.browsingData.remove() callback does not work in V2 and is an open issue with Google Chrome.

Version .3 (September 14th 2021)

* Fixed issue where Google Chrome 93.0.4577.63 broke the callback for browserData.remove().
